verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim Now the Philistines נִלְחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> nil-cha-Mu fought בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El; against Israel וַיָּ֑נָס <S%H5127><s%> vai-Ya-nos; fled אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- and the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, the Philistines וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-Lu and fell down חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> cha-la-Lim slain בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> gil-Bo-a'. Gilboa

וַיַּדְבְּק֣וּ <S%H1692><s%> vai-yad-be-Ku followed hard פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rei and after בָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav; his sons וַיַּכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku slew פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, and the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹנָתָ֧ן <S%H3129><s%> yo-na-Tan Jonathan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲבִינָדָ֛ב <S%H41><s%> 'a-vi-na-Dav and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַלְכִּי־ mal-ki- שׁ֖וּעַ <S%H4444><s%> Shu-a' and Malchishua בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul. of Saul

וַתִּכְבַּ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> vat-tich-Bad went sore הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah And the battle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, against Saul וַיִּמְצָאֻ֖הוּ <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-tza-'U-hu hit הַמּוֹרִ֣ים <S%H3384><s%> ham-mo-Rim of the archers בַּקָּ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bak-Ka-shet; arch וַיָּ֖חֶל <S%H2342><s%> vai-Ya-chel him and he was wounded מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- by הַיּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H3384><s%> hai-yo-Rim. the archers

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said שָׁאוּל֩ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about נֹשֵׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> no-Se bearer כֵלָ֜יו <S%H3627><s%> che-Lav to his armor שְׁלֹ֥ף <S%H8025><s%> she-Lof Draw חַרְבְּךָ֣׀ <S%H2719><s%> char-be-Cha thy sword וְדָקְרֵ֣נִי <S%H1856><s%> ve-da-ke-Re-ni and thrust בָ֗הּ Vah, פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise יָבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u come הָעֲרֵלִ֤ים <S%H6189><s%> ha-'a-re-Lim me through therewith lest these uncircumcised הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these וְהִתְעַלְּלוּ־ <S%H5953><s%> ve-hit-'al-le-lu- and abuse בִ֔י Vi, וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אָבָה֙ <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vah would נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> no-Se bearer כֵלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> che-Lav, his armor כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יָרֵ֖א <S%H3372><s%> ya-Re afraid מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; not for he was sore ס sa-Mek וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul So Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ha-Che-rev, a sword וַיִּפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol and fell עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw נֹשֵֽׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> no-se- bearer כֵלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> che-Lav his armor כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> met was dead שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul; that Saul וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol he fell גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- likewise ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ha-Che-rev likewise on the sword וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mot. and died ס sa-Mek

וַיָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul So Saul וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> u-she-Lo-shet and his three בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav, sons וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To and all his house יַחְדָּ֥ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together מֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> Me-tu. died

וַ֠יִּרְאוּ <S%H7200><s%> Vai-yir-'u saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And when all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בָּעֵ֙מֶק֙ <S%H6010><s%> ba-'E-mek that [were] in the valley כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נָ֔סוּ <S%H5127><s%> Na-su, that they fled וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- for מֵ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> Me-tu were dead שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul and that Saul וּבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav; and his sons וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'az-Vu then they forsook עָרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-rei-Hem their cities וַיָּנֻ֔סוּ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nu-su, and fled וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, and the Philistines וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu and dwelt בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem. ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat, And it came to pass on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, when the Philistines לְפַשֵּׁ֖ט <S%H6584><s%> le-fash-Shet to strip אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽחֲלָלִ֑ים <S%H2491><s%> ha-cha-la-Lim; the slain וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-tze-'U that they found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav, and his sons נֹפְלִ֖ים <S%H5307><s%> no-fe-Lim fallen בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> gil-Bo-a'. Gilboa

וַיַּ֨פְשִׁיטֻ֔הוּ <S%H6584><s%> vai-Yaf-shi-Tu-hu, And when they had stripped וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U him they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho his head וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav; and his armour וַיְשַׁלְּח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-le-Chu and sent בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> ve-'e-retz- into the land פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim of the Philistines סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about לְבַשֵּׂ֛ר <S%H1319><s%> le-vas-Ser to carry tidings אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H6091><s%> 'a-tzab-bei-Hem unto their idols וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. and to the people

וַיָּשִׂ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Si-mu And they put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav, his armour בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the house אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; of their gods וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גֻּלְגָּלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H1538><s%> gul-gal-To his head תָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> ta-ke-'U and fastened בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the temple דָּגֽוֹן׃ <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon. of Dagon ס sa-Mek

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-me-'U, heard כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> ya-Veish Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad; Gilead אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su had done פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim all that the Philistines לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> le-sha-'Ul. to Saul

וַיָּקוּמוּ֮ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-ku-Mu They arose כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men חַיִל֒ <S%H2428><s%> cha-Yil all the valiant וַיִּשְׂא֞וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U and took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גּוּפַ֣ת <S%H1480><s%> gu-Fat the body שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, of Saul וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גּוּפֹ֣ת <S%H1480><s%> gu-Fot and the bodies בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav, of his sons וַיְבִיא֖וּם <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'Um and brought יָבֵ֑ישָׁה <S%H3003><s%> ya-Vei-shah; them to Jabesh וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-be-Ru and buried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַצְמוֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H6106><s%> atz-mo-tei-Hem their bones תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הָאֵלָה֙ <S%H424><s%> ha-'e-Lah under the oak בְּיָבֵ֔שׁ <S%H3003><s%> be-ya-Vesh, in Jabesh וַיָּצ֖וּמוּ <S%H6684><s%> vai-ya-Tzu-mu and fasted שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, So Saul בְּמַֽעֲלוֹ֙ <S%H4603><s%> be-ma-'a-Lo which he committed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מָעַ֣ל <S%H4604><s%> ma-'Al for his transgression בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, against the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var [even] against the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not שָׁמָ֑ר <S%H8104><s%> sha-Mar; which he kept וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and also לִשְׁא֥וֹל <S%H7592><s%> lish-'ol not and also for asking בָּא֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> ba-'ov [counsel] of [one that had] a familiar spirit לִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> lid-Roosh. to enquire

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and did not דָרַ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> da-Rash And enquired בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh not of the LORD וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <S%H4191><s%> vay-mi-Te-hu; therefore he slew וַיַּסֵּב֙ <S%H5437><s%> vai-yas-Sev him and turned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <S%H4410><s%> ham-me-lu-Chah, the kingdom לְדָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid unto David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <S%H3448><s%> yi-Shai. of Jesse פ Peh
